long.en: # Services (GLPI) This plugin allow adding informations to services based on ITIL concepts (DR, Owner, communications) # Installation (EN) * Uncompress the archive to the `<GLPI_ROOT>/plugins/services` directory * Navigate to the Configuration > Plugins page, * Install and activate the plugin.
